channel.title: Black Mesa: Opposing Force or Blue Shift?
channel.description: If Half Life is being remade. Will the two add expansions Opposing Force and Blue shift be remade as well?

item.title: Black Mesa: Opposing Force or Blue Shift?
item.dc:creator: brokenfridgehinge
item.description:
λdam:

They are being recreated, but by separate teams.

On ModDB, there are:

Operation Black Mesa: Opposing Force.

Guard Duty: Blue Shift

This. Read the FAQ next time or use the Got a Question thread.

Read full topic
item.source: Black Mesa: Opposing Force or Blue Shift?

item.title: Black Mesa: Opposing Force or Blue Shift?
item.dc:creator: wheybags
item.description:
1. No
  2. I read the title as Opposing Farce or Blue Shit.

Read full topic
item.source: Black Mesa: Opposing Force or Blue Shift?

item.title: Black Mesa: Opposing Force or Blue Shift?
item.dc:creator: Brother_Shrike
item.description:
Your logic is flawed. Let’s pick this apart shall we.

JohnKiller118:

The fact that this is his first post.

That doesn’t mean anything. He could have just found the mod, saw how epic it is, and wondered if the team would use their resources to remake these other games he likes.

JohnKiller118:

The fact that there were many other threads just like this.

Again, you assume he lurked for a while and didn’t just join.

JohnKiller118:

If he doesn’t become a regular poster after this, then he is defiantly a troll.

Or maybe he assumed that the you’re an exemplary member of the BM forums and was scared off. :retard:

Read full topic
item.source: Black Mesa: Opposing Force or Blue Shift?

Shoot first, ask question later?

item.title: Black Mesa: Opposing Force or Blue Shift?
item.dc:creator: Brother_Shrike
item.description:
JohnKiller118:

Reported!

Seriously, the Gearbox expansions sucked! Opposing Force was decent, but Blue Shit made brown shit looked like gold! So why remake these abominations of an otherwise fantastic game series?

:facepalm:

Read full topic
